Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Human Meteor and Suspicious Events
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor and the initial suspicious events setting up the story.

sub_scenes.title: Cover Introduction
sub_scenes.description: The cover page introduces the Human Meteor and sets the underwater scene.

sub_scenes.title: Taxi to Waterfront and Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Duke's taxi ride to the waterfront and growing suspicion of being followed.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi to the Waterfront and Suspicious Following

sub_scenes.title: Transformation and Action
sub_scenes.description: Duke transforms into Human Meteor after noticing suspicious sedan.

Major_Arcs.title: Confrontation and Yacht Investigation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Human Meteor's confrontation, hospital visit, and the start of the yacht investigation.

sub_scenes.title: Street Confrontation and Police
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts the sedan and police arrive at the scene.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital and Stowaway Plan
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor in hospital, suspicion about yacht, and Duke plans to stowaway.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Stowaway Plan and Radio Message

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Deck and Cabin Intrusion
sub_scenes.description: Pete on yacht deck, observes divers, and investigates cabin.

narrative_arcs.title: Yacht Deck Duties and Cabin Investigation

sub_scenes.title: Cabin Attack and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Pete discovers depth chart, is attacked and thrown overboard, then rescued as Toby.

Major_Arcs.title: Underwater Mission and Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers Toby's underwater mission, discovery of the submarine, and initial conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Toby's Underwater Mission Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Toby receives mission briefing and enters the water.

sub_scenes.title: Submarine Discovery and Enemy Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Toby finds sunken submarine and encounters enemy diver.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of the Sunken Submarine and Enemy Diver

sub_scenes.title: Enemy Torpedo Operation
sub_scenes.description: Enemy submarine crew loading torpedoes.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Fight and Escape
sub_scenes.description: Underwater fight with enemy divers and submarine escape, interrupted by tentacles.

sub_scenes.title: Namor's Torpedo Attack
sub_scenes.description: Namor attacks the submarine with a torpedo.

sub_scenes.title: Ship Crew's Reaction
sub_scenes.description: Ship crew discovers Peter's death and reacts to geyser.

sub_scenes.title: Namor Pursues Ship and Surfaces
sub_scenes.description: Namor pursues ship, needs air, and surfaces on yacht to news of Peter's death.

narrative_arcs.title: Namor's Pursuit of the Ship and Need for Air
Namor Surfaces and Learns of Peter's Death

sub_scenes.title: Investigation of Peter and Urgent Departure
sub_scenes.description: Namor investigates Peter's cabin, reveals treachery, and urgently departs with Toby.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Depth Map and Peter's Treachery Revealed

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Recovery and Home
sub_scenes.description: Namor visits Toby in hospital, they discuss recovery and go home.

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and Nazi Spy Ring
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the Liberty Lads, their connection to the boys, and the confrontation with the Nazi spy ring.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Combat
sub_scenes.description: Liberty Lads fight Nazi fiends.

narrative_arcs.title: Liberty Lads in Combat Against Enemies

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance and Injured Man
sub_scenes.description: Boys observe ambulance arrival and injured man.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambulance Arrival and Discovery of Injured Man

sub_scenes.title: Dropped Wallet and Garage Lead
sub_scenes.description: Boys find dropped wallet, leading to garage address.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and the Garage Address

sub_scenes.title: Garage Observation and Major Bronson
sub_scenes.description: Boys near garage, observe marine salute and learn about Major Bronson.

narrative_arcs.title: The Marine Salute and Major Bronson

sub_scenes.title: Police Encounter at Garage
sub_scenes.description: Boys at garage encounter police officer.

narrative_arcs.title: Encounter with the Police Officer at the Garage

sub_scenes.title: Inside Garage and Mr. Horst
sub_scenes.description: Boys inside garage, meet Mr. Horst.

narrative_arcs.title: Inside the Garage and the Order to Wait
The Abrupt Arrival of Mr. Horst

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Carbon Monoxide Plan
sub_scenes.description: Boys interrogated by Horst, Bronson proposes carbon monoxide plan.

sub_scenes.title: Chase, Capture, and Bronson's Threat
sub_scenes.description: Boys chased, captured, Bronson threatens them with gun.

sub_scenes.title: Horst's Betrayal and Boys' Escape
sub_scenes.description: Horst betrays Bronson, boys escape amidst chaos.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Help and Sabotage Plans
sub_scenes.description: Boys seek help, discover sabotage plans in secret office.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Sabotage Plans in Secret Office

sub_scenes.title: Barracks Attack and Marine Response
sub_scenes.description: Barracks attacked, Marines respond, Major injured, Nazi ring busted.

Major_Arcs.title: South American Adventure and Rosita Rescue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Champ and Henry's adventure in South America and the rescue of President Rosita's daughter.

sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry ambushed, arrive in South American town.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in a South American Town

sub_scenes.title: Soldiers Find Americans and Questioning
sub_scenes.description: Soldiers find Americans, begin questioning about Rosita.

sub_scenes.description: Flashback to past questioning, Champ plans escape to Consul.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape and Plan to Seek Consul

sub_scenes.title: Abduction and Mistaken Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Men abducted, arrive at house, mistaken for rescuers of Rosita.

sub_scenes.description: Plan to go to Tamale Street, infiltrate El Tigre's hideout.

sub_scenes.description: Stage dollar diversion, sock attack, confrontation with El Tigre.

sub_scenes.title: Argument and Interrogation
sub_scenes.description: Argument, man in barrel, interrogation about Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre
El Tigre's Concern about Name Misuse

sub_scenes.title: Misunderstanding and News of Rosita
sub_scenes.description: Mistaken enemy, news of Rosita's location by Axis agents.

sub_scenes.title: Immediate Rescue Mission and Hotel Infiltration
sub_scenes.description: Immediate rescue mission, pursuit, hotel infiltration, Rosita rescued.

narrative_arcs.title: Citadel Escape and Rear Entrance Plan

sub_scenes.title: Hotel Fight and Rescue Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Hotel fight, maid's intervention, post-conflict gratitude and recognition.

narrative_arcs.title: Machine Gun Threat and Maid's Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan Jungle Combat and Capture
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Devil Dog Dolan's jungle combat, capture, and torture.

sub_scenes.description: Jungle combat introduction, Captain Lawton's dilemma revealed.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Tracking and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Jungle infiltration, ominous observation, ambush.

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Interrogation
sub_scenes.description: Dolan captured, interrogated, tortured for plans.

Major_Arcs.title: Dolan's Escape, Native Alliance, and Captain's Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers Dolan's escape, alliance with natives, and Captain Lawton's final decisions regarding his son and Dolan.

sub_scenes.description: Office chase, fire starts, Dolan engulfed in flames.

sub_scenes.description: Grauer's plan, native huts set on fire.

Intentional Arson and Dolan in Flames

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Ambush and Native Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Jungle ambush, Dolan revealed, chief's death, native alliance.

sub_scenes.description: Captain's dilemma, surprise encounter, bar brawl.

narrative_arcs.title: Barroom Brawl - Taste of American Lead

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Dolan's Lesson
sub_scenes.description: Order rescinded, shore leave, Dolan spanked and learns lesson.

sub_scenes.description: Briefing on Reilly case in newspaper office.

sub_scenes.description: Shooters apprehended, emergency transport to hospital.

sub_scenes.description: Hospital wait, blood transfusion needed, community responds, Reilly recovers.
